ICS-280 Spring 2002, Seminar
[ course reference | homework | handouts ]

Meeting Time: Thursdays 3:30 - 5:50pm
Location: CS/E 310



The seminar will follow several chapters from Judea Pearl's new book "Causality: models, Reasoning and Inference".

Students will be expected to go through chapters of the book. Each student will be required to give a few presentations, and encouraged to engage in research questions.

For more information see:

http://bayes.cs.ucla.edu/BOOK-2K/

The book will be available at the UCI bookstore or Amazon.com.

School of Information and Computer Science University of California, Irvine, CA 92697-3435 Dr. Rina Dechter dechter at ics.uci.edu
